page.title: 12CURRIE ART CLUB
page.content: We interviewed Mrs G and Mrs H from the Pentland Art Club. The club meets on Thursdays and lasts for three hours, starting at 7.00pm. It costs Â£4.00 per year for adults and Â£2.50 for children and OAP's. There are 85 people in the art club and there is a commitee of eight people running the club. At the end of August they have an annual exhibition. They sometimes sell some of their work. The syllabus is varied and they have talks and demonstrations or do practical work. They sometimes go outside or to the museum to paint or draw. The club also visits art galleries. Apart from drawing and painting the club practises silver work, tapestry, embroidery and printing. This is the eighteenth year of the Pentland Art Club's existence.
